short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to automatically scroll down the current webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto Scroll is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that automates scrolling on web pages for effortless reading and browsing. Perfect for articles, blogs, and lengthy documents, it ensures a seamless scrolling experience. Customize scroll speed and direction to suit your needs with an intuitive interface. Save time and enhance productivity while navigating long web content. Ideal for users who prefer hands-free scrolling or need accessibility assistance. Lightweight, user-friendly, and compatible with most websites. Download Auto Scroll now to revolutionize your browsing experience!
